rows.label: qst703001_msg0001
rows.name:
My lords and ladies, I'm sorry to
trouble you, but I was wondering if
you could help me with something.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0002
rows.name:
What with Your Majesty and
Prince Adel out on campaign...

rows.label: qst703001_msg0003
rows.name:
It has been decided that I will confer
with a special envoy from Gula.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0004
rows.name:
Given that our Superbian Divine Beast
has been showing signs of decline,
it's important that we act now.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0005
rows.name:
I plan to air my opinion on the
future of both our countries.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0006
rows.name:
Our conference was to be aboard this
flagship, and the envoy was to come
from the White Chair in Gula...

rows.label: qst703001_msg0008
rows.name:
To get here from the White
Chair, it's necessary to pass
through the Hoary Weald...

rows.label: qst703001_msg0009
rows.name:
A dangerous place... We assume
something happened to the envoy there.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0010
rows.name:
However, we do not have the
military resources to mount a
full search of the Hoary Weald.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0011
rows.name:
Therefore, I thought that I might
burden you with this request.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0012
rows.name:
Please, go to the Hoary Weald and
search for the Gulan special envoy.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0013
rows.name:
Sorry for this sudden request,
but I would not trouble you
had I any other option.

rows.label: qst703001_msg0101
rows.name:
Now that I think of it, I should
probably have sent him to Bathein...
